name: Heracross
description: This powerful Pokémon thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies, then lifts and throws them.

attacks.name: Green Draw
attacks.effect: Draw a card for each of your Grass Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Double Headbutt
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.
